General.Name: Krungthai Car Rent and Lease Public Company Limited
General.Description: Krungthai Car Rent and Lease Public Company Limited, operates as a car leasing and rental company in Thailand. It is also involved in the buying, selling, and exchanging of used and unused cars and spare parts. In addition, the company offers car maintenance services, such as fitting and repairing services; and car insurance and replacement services, as well as third-party insurance. It serves individuals; and medium and large, multinational corporation, government, and state enterprises. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

4.Name: Mr. Sakditouch  Chantarasereekul
